  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main Method is used to allow command-line interface (CLI) execution
      Parameters:
      args - buildAsset - [FILENAME] [Immutable:Data] [Additional:Information]
         Generates a file with Data and MetaData about an ASSET
          [Immutable:Data] is mandatory. This argument receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
          [Additional:Information] is mandatory. This argument receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      args - buildTransfer - [FILENAME] [Transfer:Information]
          [Transfer:Information] is mandatory. This argument receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      args - buildWallet [FILENAME]
         Creates two files with an ECDSA keyset in Base58.

      args - deployNFT [SERVER] [PRIVATE-KEY-FILE] [PUBLIC-KEY-FILE] [NFT-FILE]
         Used to CREATE a Non-Fungible-Token
      args - deployToken [SERVER] [PRIVATE-KEY-FILE] [PUBLIC-KEY-FILE] [TOKEN-FILE] [AMOUNT]
         Used to CREATE a Token

      args - transferNFT - [SERVER] [PRIVATE-KEY-FILE] [PUBLIC-KEY-FILE] [ASSET-ID] [METADATA-FILE] [DEST-PUBLIC-KEY-FILE]
      Used to TRANSFER a Non-Fungible-Token
      args - transferToken - [SERVER] [PRIVATE-KEY-FILE] [PUBLIC-KEY-FILE] [ASSET-ID] [DEST-PUBLIC-KEY-FILE] [AMOUNT]
         Transfer an amount of Token.

      args - walletBalance - [SERVER] [PRIVATE-KEY-FILE] [PUBLIC-KEY-FILE]
         Shows the list of Assets in the Wallet.

    • deploy

      public String deploy(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String asset, Long amount)
      Deploys a Token in the BigChainDB.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      asset - Receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String Immutable Information about the ASSET
      (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      amount - Receives the Amount of the Token (maximum value is 9×10¹⁸).
      Returns:
      Return the ASSET-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • deploy

      public String deploy(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String asset, String metadata)
      Deploys a NFT in the BigChainBD Network
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      asset - Receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String Immutable Information about the ASSET
      (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      metadata - Receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String from Metadata Information about the ASSET
      (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      Returns:
      Return the ASSET-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • transfer

      public String transfer(String url, String senderPrivateKey, String senderPublicKey, String assetID, String recipientPublicKey, String metadata)
      Transfer a NFT in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984").
      senderPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      senderPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      assetID - Receives the ASSET-ID from the Asset that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      recipientPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the receiver wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "FNJPJdtuPQYsqHG6tuUjKjqv7SW84U4ipiyyLV2j6MEW").
      metadata - Receives a Colon and Semicolon Separated String from Metadata Information about the ASSET
         (e.g., "key0:value0;key1:value1;key2:value2; ... ;keyN:valueN").
      Returns:
      Return the TRANSFER-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • transfer

      public String transfer(String url, String senderPrivateKey, String senderPublicKey, String assetID, String recipientPublicKey, Integer amount)
      Transfers a token in the BigChainDB Network.
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984")
      senderPrivateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      senderPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      assetID - Receives the ASSET-ID from the token that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      recipientPublicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the receiver wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "FNJPJdtuPQYsqHG6tuUjKjqv7SW84U4ipiyyLV2j6MEW").
      amount - Receives the number of tokens that will transfer.
      Returns:
      Return the TRANSFER-ID case every crypto-conditions are fulfilled in the transaction at BigChainDB Network
         (e.g, "9019f938c175ad768f76b3ce4842a066a99198f68dc3078b0fab58349ece5896").

    • stampTransaction

      public String stampTransaction(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey, String transactionID)
      Stamps a transaction
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984")
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the sender wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      transactionID - Receives the TRANSFER-ID from the token that wants to transfer to another wallet
         (e.g., "095ee8b3a8599fabe61a09c1c046df7b8af3cb4f70b815222daad132988bd67d").
      Returns:
      Not null if the transaction was successfully stamped.

    • walletBalance

      public ArrayList<WalletContent> walletBalance(String url, String privateKey, String publicKey)
      Lists content of the Wallet
      Parameters:
      url - Receives a URL:PORT Address from a bigchainDB Server
         (e.g., "http://testchain.chon.group:9984")
      privateKey - Receives a Base58 format Private Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "A4BAzNZdGBqkGHQP7gWovcYaGP3UELL6f4THhuHSQHCK").
      publicKey - Receives a Base58 format Public Key from the wallet in the BigChainDB Network
         (e.g., "arDLZkDEmZi5wWtebvZrC5KgSs2tX8ULLeBSFp8dTJR").
      Returns:
      a ArrayList of WalletContent.
      See Also:
      • WalletContent

    • buildWallet

      public static String[] buildWallet()
      Creates a ECDSA Pair Keys in String Base58.
      Returns:

      • The first element (return[0]) is the Private Key in the format defined in base parameter.
      • The second element (return[1]) is the Public Key in the format defined in base parameter.
